scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:build
scripts.docker:clean:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yaml rm && docker rmi -f seneca-tech-task
scripts.docker:start:clean:dev: npm run docker:clean:dev && npm run docker:start:dev
scripts.start: npm run clean:build && npm run docker:start:dev
scripts.start:clean: npm run clean:build && npm run docker:start:clean:dev
scripts.start:development: npm run clean:build && mkdir ./build && touch ./build/index.js && concurrently "npm run build:watch" "nodemon ./build/index.js"
scripts.start:production: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./build/server/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean:build && npm run build && npm run test:server
scripts.test:server: SERVICE_PORT=4000 LOG_LEVEL=silent NODE_ENV=test nyc mocah build/tests --recursive
